source: Approximation based on DeFi whale analysis patterns
note: Stability Pool distribution follows typical power-law for risk-taking capital. Critical threshold: No single entity should control >33% to prevent liquidation blocking.
risk_assessment: Moderate concentration. Top provider holds 18%, well below the 33% censorship threshold. Nakamoto Coefficient of 4 indicates healthy distribution.
mechanism_note: Unlike governance tokens, SP providers cannot 'block' liquidationsâ€”they can only withdraw. Withdrawal during stress is economically irrational (they forfeit liquidation gains).
